author: Five Binaries
title: Implement CIP12 to Yoroi backends
description: CIP12 defines on-chain stake pool operator to delegates communication and is missing implementation in Yoroi backend.
solution: We will implement CIP12 communications to Yoroi backend software. This proposal has been accepted in fund3, but ended up being over budget.
experience: We are co-authors of CIP12 with Emurgo.
